testcase.classname: Working on United Airlines OFFERS section under Deals
testcase.name: Getting Electronic travel certificate Under Redeem eCert

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given I am on United Airlines Home page.....................................passed And I click on the DEALS option.............................................passed When I clicked On Redeem eCertificate link..................................passed And scroll to Electronic travel certificate Section.........................undefined And Select Year "2019" Under Year Issued....................................skipped And entered "1234567891" in PIN Options.....................................skipped And enter " Selam " in the last name field..................................skipped When I clicked on confirm button............................................skipped Then I should have get "Please make sure you entered valid information " in return.skipped
